QuestData.Title: Nightborne Know-How
QuestData.Description:
Ancient symbols aren't really me thing. However...
<Thaelin searches through his belongings, eventually pulling out a map. At the top of the parchment appears the name Antonidas, scribbled in large, sloppy letters.>
Ah hah! Here it is!
Bit of a trek, but a few of those old magic users can be found... here.
<Pointing to a spot on the map.>
Maybe they have somethin' tae offer.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Warpcaster Delandra at Camp Antonidas in The Azure Span.
